provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Loans to Small Businasses
(Limitation) Regulations, 1956.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. It is hereby prescribed that loans to be granted or guaranteed
pursuant to paragxaph (a) or (b), as the case may be, of subsection (2)
of section 5 of the Act shall not exceed $40,000 in respect of any one
business.
                  tnoludaa of thb plpe b wtbohd by L.N. %/1911)
